POSTagger

POSTagger.Rd

POSTagger

POSTagger(wordDF)

Arguments

wordDF

Dataframe including one column labeled "word" for tagging

Value

Original dataframe including part of speech columns.

Examples

newwords <- data.frame(word = c("cat", "green", "slowly"))
POSTagger(newwords)
#>     word                   pos n_pos space primary
#> 1    cat Verb (usu participle)     2 FALSE   FALSE
#> 2    cat                  Noun     2 FALSE    TRUE
#> 3  green                  Noun     3 FALSE    TRUE
#> 4  green Verb (usu participle)     3 FALSE   FALSE
#> 5  green             Adjective     3 FALSE   FALSE
#> 6 slowly                Adverb     1 FALSE    TRUE
